== LinuxFest Northwest 2008 ==
<nowiki>[[File:2008poster-209x320.jpg]]</nowiki>

== Project Overview ==
 '''Status:''' Work in progress

 '''Type:''' Event

 '''Date:''' April 26 & April 27

 '''Location:''' Bellingham Technical College, 3028 Lindbergh Avenue, Bellingham, WA 98225 <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&q=3028+Lindbergh+Avenue,+Bellingham,+WA+98225&ie=UTF8&z=15&om=1&iwloc=addr|Map]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://www.btc.ctc.edu/Welcome/CampusDirectory.html|Driving Directions]]</nowiki>

=== Purpose/Problem Statement ===
This is a great opportunity to advocate Ubuntu and have some fun with other linux users.

=== Mission ===
Advocate Ubuntu and distribute CD's and literature.

=== Objectives ===
* Answer questions
* Distribute CD's
* Provide demo machines for people to try
* Provide literature
